talk.author: did:plc:ml57nmipiqdjcauao5fyi3mu
talk.utter:
朝寒くて学校行く時つらいよね😓
最近は雪国から来ましたみたいな格好で登校してる🤭🤭

talk.author: did:plc:2fcpatsqk6esj2xq76khd3wm
talk.utter:

私も暖かくして学校に行ってる☺️

もう朝お布団から出れない(*´艸`)

talk.author: did:plc:ml57nmipiqdjcauao5fyi3mu
talk.utter: 冬の間だけでも学校滅びて欲しいと毎日思ってる笑

talk.author: did:plc:2fcpatsqk6esj2xq76khd3wm
talk.utter: 確かに🤔冬の間だけ行きたくないw

talk.author: did:plc:2fcpatsqk6esj2xq76khd3wm
talk.utter: 確かに🤔冬の間だけ行きたくないw

talk.author: did:plc:ml57nmipiqdjcauao5fyi3mu
talk.utter:
でも夏は夏で暑すぎるよね笑
秋と春求めてるのに全然ない🤣

talk.author: did:plc:2fcpatsqk6esj2xq76khd3wm
talk.utter: ほんとにね！でも春だと花粉症が🥹

talk.author: did:plc:2fcpatsqk6esj2xq76khd3wm

talk.author: did:plc:ml57nmipiqdjcauao5fyi3mu

talk.author: did:plc:2fcpatsqk6esj2xq76khd3wm
talk.utter: 秋しかないけど秋ってすぐ終わっちゃうよね🥲

talk.author: did:plc:2fcpatsqk6esj2xq76khd3wm
